item.description: Garrett will be leading a walk this Saturday at Wompatuck State park. The weather is supposed to be sunny and low 50's on Saturday, so get your hikes in before the snow flies.
item.how_to_find_us: 172 Union St. Hingham, MA. Drive in a little ways and there will be a visitors center on the right with parking.

group.name: The South Shore Dog Lovers Pack Walk

item.name: Walk at Wompatuck
